NONE:
[Click 3 Buttons in the Central Panel ]
to enter 3 modes

[Shake Your Hand upon the Light Sensor ]
to clear all traks

[Put Your Hand up the Light Sensor]
 to freeze labels

[Click the Tonality]
to lock/unlock it
NONE-NOLIGHT:
[Click 2 White Buttons in the Central Panel]
 to enter 2 modes
[Click the Tonality]
to lock/unlock it
[Click Clear All Button]
to clear all tracks
[Press Freeze Button]
to freeze labels
PERCUSSION:
[Click </>]
 to switch between instruments

[Drag Tags on the Slide Bar]
to set thresholds of 2 sounds

[Make Voice]
to generate sounds

[Move Your Hand upon the Light Sensor]
to go back
PERCUSSION-NOLIGHT:
[Click </>]
 to switch between instruments
[Drag Tags on the Slide Bar]
to set thresholds of 2 sounds
[Make Voice]
to generate sounds
[Click Back Button]
to go back
PLUCK:
[Click </>]
 to switch between instruments

[Drag Tag on the Slide Bar]
to set interval

[Click Start]
to start generation

[Rotate Knob]
to change note

[Move Your Hand upon the Light Sensor]
to go back
PLUCK-NOLIGHT:
[Click </>]
 to switch between instruments
[Drag Tag on the Slide Bar]
to set interval
[Click Start]
to start generation
[Rotate Knob]	o change note
[Click Back Button]
to go back
ORCHE:
[Click </>]
to switch between instruments

[Keep Your Hand upon the Light Sensor] to generate note

[Drag the Time Tag]
to change the cost time

[Click Back Button]
to go back
ORCHE-NOLIGHT:
[Click </>]
 to switch between instruments
[Keep Your Hand upon the Light Sensor] to generate note
[Drag the Time Tag]
to change the cost time
[Click Back Button]
to go back
